headline: Founder and CEO @ Refy | Green Fintech | Project Finance | Ex-Goldman
summary:
I am building Refy, a credit-focused fintech platform backed by Wavemaker Impact (wavemaker.vc), with a dedicated mission to transform green asset financing across APAC.

Before launching Refy, I co-founded and served as the CEO of OctiFi, an innovative buy now pay later platform backed by Y-Combinator (YC W21). Our pioneering use of machine learning in credit underwriting empowered us to provide affordable loans to responsible spenders, culminating in the platform's acquisition by Latitude Financial (latitudefinancial.com.au).  My leadership extended to driving LatitudePay's APAC expansion, managing strategic partnerships, product development and overseeing credit underwriting and risk management. 

With a decade plus in fixed-income credit, trading, and portfolio management, I bring a strong technopreneurial ethos along with hands-on expertise in fundraising, sales, operations, and data science.

experiences.title: Founder and CEO
experiences.description: Our mission at Refy is to empower sustainable developers by providing tailored project financing solutions spanning renewable energy, water, transportation, and energy efficiency sectors. Leveraging an innovative Asset-as-a-Service model, we're enabling developers to build, own, and manage a diverse portfolio of green assets, with a primary emphasis on small to mid-scale projects ($500k-$15m) in the APAC market.

experiences.title: Founding Partner | Chief Operating Officer
experiences.description:
Traditional credit left people behind.  We accelerate commerce with instant 0% interest loans for responsible spenders.  We make it easy for businesses of all sizes to offer buy now pay later (BNPL) to spur sales.

LatitudePay Asia is a subsidiary of Latitude Financial Services (previously GE Money), a publicly-listed Australian consumer finance company (AXS: LFS) with $2B+ market cap and 3,400+ merchants.

Appointed to the new role of Chief Operating Officer, I am responsible for leading LatitudePay’s APAC expansion, and managing strategic operational activities that include new product development, strategic partnerships, loan underwriting and risk analytics & controls.

experiences.title: Founder and CEO, formerly OctiFi (YC W21)
experiences.description:
Our mission is simple: deliver access to affordable credit to anyone with a smartphone.

At OctiFi (YC W21) we are reinventing digital credit to make it more accessible for all consumers.   We are using modern technology to re-imagine the checkout experience and make it easy for businesses of all sizes to offer responsible credit to their customers.  Together, we are inspired by that moonshot ambition to reshape financial services, starting with Southeast Asia.

experiences.title: Chief Data Officer
experiences.description: Sweeten was a Series B funded renovation marketplace that connects homeowners to remodelling professionals.  I served on the management team in a dual role as Head of Data and Finance.  My primary role as Chief Data Officer was to leverage our vast data repository to identify product opportunities, build data products and maximise commercial value attained from such data.  Our data team designed and implemented ML-based backend routines and models, data processing pipelines and a next generation matching algorithm.  I also oversaw finance and accounting and worked closely with the CEO in fund raising and strategic planning.

experiences.title: Managing Partner
experiences.description: Roomunity pioneers co-living concept in the city of New Haven with services ranging from roommate matching, property management to real estate underwriting and investment.

experiences.title: Managing Director | Portfolio Manager
experiences.description: Served as the Co-Head for residential and commercial MBS and senior trader for a 4bn long-short multi-strategy hedge fund with a diverse portfolio of primarily fixed income investments. Investments concentrated in real estate-backed securities, asset-backed structured products and deep-value specialty finance and real estate equities

experiences.title: Managing Director
Vice President
experiences.description:
- Primary subprime cash/derivatives trader, with experience managing risk in ABS CDOs and European MBS/ABS

- Developed servicer algorithm to capture changing servicer’s behavior which helped to avoid heavy losses in 2011

- Part of the 4-person team that navigated the subprime crisis successfully and generated $3.4bn P&L in 2007

experiences.title: Analyst
experiences.description:
- Advised clients on the structuring and valuation of various structured credit products, including 9 CLO transactions totaling $3.1bn.  Responsibilities included client coverage, transaction modeling, documentation/execution, and rating agency, surety provider and investor interface in connection with asset securitization

- Created and implemented the first GS "Coupon Guaranteed Swap" to optimize deal capital structure.  Design had been adopted in subsequent GS-led CLO transactions

volunteer_work.title: Member Board Of Directors
volunteer_work.description: Apex for Youth is a volunteer-based non-profit that serves at-risk youth in NYC.

certifications.name: Startup Arena Pitch Battle Regional Winner (Singapore)
